address.streetAddress: Lory Plan, Inspirada at Prairie Center Village

location.fullValue: Lory Plan, Inspirada at Prairie Center Village

data.description: Wow! Major Price Reduction!!!! Do not miss out on this 3 Bed, 3 Bath, 3 Car Garage with Man Cave/ or another non-conforming bedroom in the basement!! Granite countertops!!  Wood plank porcelain tile!! A/C! Front covered porch! Back Patio! This amazing home is centrally located in Brighton, providing easy access to all the best that the area has to offer. Close to parks, shopping, police station, fire department and schools.  Whether you're looking for a stroll through historic downtown to check out the local businesses and boutiques or need to pick up some essentials at Prairie Center's big box stores, you'll be just minutes away. With its convenient location, this home offers the perfect balance of quiet suburban living and easy access to all the amenities you need!! Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds!!! Buyer and Buyer agent to verify Legal Description, Zoning, Measurements, Schools, Sqft, Hoa(s), Taxes, Permits, finished sqft, All Inspections and everything on Mls Printout 2543256
